description: These flavour packed mushrooms are a Spanish staple everyone will love.
keywords: Roast vegetable,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Sesame free,Mushroom,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Lemon & Garlic Mushrooms Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and add the mushrooms. Cook for 5 minutes until softened. Add the garlic, lemon juice and zest and paprika and cook for 5 minutes, stirring.
Serve with cracked black pepper and fresh parsley on top.
